TextLearner

Source: R/text_learner.R
TextLearner.Rd

Basic class for a `Learner` in NLP.

TextLearner(
  dls,
  model,
  alpha = 2,
  beta = 1,
  moms = list(0.8, 0.7, 0.8),
  loss_func = NULL,
  opt_func = Adam,
  lr = 0.001,
  splitter = trainable_params(),
  cbs = NULL,
  metrics = NULL,
  path = NULL,
  model_dir = "models",
  wd = NULL,
  wd_bn_bias = FALSE,
  train_bn = TRUE
)
